data.3: What do you comprehend by the concrete reality?
data.4: The Thamud and ´Ad denied the consequential calamity.
data.5: So destroyed were the Thamud by a storm of thunder and lightning;
data.6: And the ´Ad were destroyed by the furious cold blast of roaring wind
data.7: Which He sent to assail them for seven nights and eight days running. You should have seen the people prostrate like the decayed trunks of date-palm trees.
data.8: Do you see any trace of them?
data.9: Then came the Pharaoh, and those before him whose habitations were overthrown while they were committing crimes.
data.10: When they disobeyed the apostle of their Lord He seized them with an overwhelming punishment.
data.11: When the water rose in flood, We bore you in the ark,
data.12: In order to make it a warning for you, and that the ear retentive may preserve it.
data.13: When the single blast is sounded on the trumpet,
data.14: And the earth and mountains heaved and crushed to powder with one levelling blow,
data.15: On that Day will come what is to come.
data.16: The sky will cleave asunder on that day and fall to pieces.
data.17: On its fringes will be angels, eight of them, bearing their Lord´s throne aloft.
data.18: You will then be set before Him, and not one of you will remain unexposed.
data.19: He who is given his ledger in his right hand, will say: "Here, read my ledger.
data.20: I was certain I´ll be given my account."
data.21: So he shall have an agreeable life
data.23: With fruits hanging low within reach,
data.24: (And told:) "Eat and drink to your fill as reward for (good) deeds you had done in days of yore."
data.25: But whosoever gets his ledger in his left hand, will say: "Would that I were never given my ledger,
data.27: I wish death had put an end to me.
data.28: Of no use was even my wealth.
data.29: Vanished has my power from me."
data.31: Then cast him to be burnt in Hell;
data.32: And string him to a chain seventy cubits long.
data.33: He did not believe in God the supreme,
data.34: Nor urged others to feed the poor.
data.35: That is why he has no friend today,
data.37: Which none but the hellish eat."
data.38: So, I call to witness what you see
data.39: And what you do not see,
data.40: That this is indeed the word of the noble Messenger,
data.41: And not the word of a poet. How little is it that you believe!
data.42: Nor is it the word of a soothsayer. Little is it that you reflect!
data.43: It has been sent down by the Lord of all the worlds.
data.44: Had he attributed falsely any words to Us,
data.45: We would have seized him by his right hand,
data.47: And not one of you would have been able to stop (Us).
data.48: It is really a reminder for those who fear God and follow the straight path.
data.49: We certainly know that some among you do deny it.
data.50: It is surely the nemesis of unbelievers.
data.51: And He, He is indeed the ultimate Reality.
data.52: So glorify your Lord, the most supreme.
